response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs, considering its worth to you is $1,000,000. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000, which we believe is a fair and advantageous proposition. We hope you will find this offer compelling and look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
